alert.note: Alert for Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rogers and northwestern Mayes Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Chelsea to 4 miles south of Foyil. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea to dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Claremore... Chelsea... Foyil... Bushyhead... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 252 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
